feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from ngkoksongofficial

entry.title: My campaign efforts were focused online and on the ground. Through my social media efforts, I was able to interact with and understand our youths, including their fears and hopes. Similarly, walking the ground has been very heartening. Nothing beats heari
entry.content: My campaign efforts were focused online and on the ground. Through my social media efforts, I was able to interact with and understand our youths, including their fears and hopes. Similarly, walking the ground has been very heartening. Nothing beats hearing the concerns and stories of Singaporeans first hand. They have helped me level the playing field with other candidates. I have been very candid and direct with you because I want you to know that I will keep to my word. Thank you for trusting me and giving me your time and attention. If elected President, I will carry out my duties honourably.üñêüèº‚ù§Ô∏è #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: I strongly believe that the time has come for the elected president to be non-partisan. We may have our differences of views and political affiliations, but differences must not become divisions in our society. We must stay united for the future. #ngkokso
entry.content: I strongly believe that the time has come for the elected president to be non-partisan. We may have our differences of views and political affiliations, but differences must not become divisions in our society. We must stay united for the future. #ngkoksong2023 #ngkoksong2023 ‚ù§Ô∏èüñêüèº Vote For Me

entry.title: On the final day of the campaign, I paid a visit to Hougang Hainanese Village in the morning. I grew up in Hougang and it always brings back fond memories. I was glad to be able to make a stop at this nostalgic place. I was blessed to be able to visit Foo
entry.content: On the final day of the campaign, I paid a visit to Hougang Hainanese Village in the morning. I grew up in Hougang and it always brings back fond memories. I was glad to be able to make a stop at this nostalgic place. I was blessed to be able to visit Foo Hai Ch'an Monastery, hosted by Reverend Ming Yi. We discussed the benefits of meditation and the importance of inter faith and inter-racial collaboration. I presented a book entitled Common Ground to the Reverend, which commemorates a two-day event I organised in 2012 to bring together leaders from different faiths to find common ground in the practice of meditation. I also had the privilege of meditating together with the devotees in silence. I then made a stop at the Church of the Holy Family to say a short prayer. My church holds a special place in my heart. It is where I worship with my family. It is where I said goodbye to my late wife Patricia and delivered her eulogy. My final stop of the campaign is at Kopitam Square in Sengkang. One last chance to meet my fellow Singaporeans before Cooling-Off Day. I have given my very best for this contest. Thank you to each and every voter who plans to support me on Friday. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture üñêÔ∏è‚ù§Ô∏è Vote for Me

entry.title: I started my campaign at Kangkar, where I was born. I have ended it in Sengkang, near where I grew up. This homecoming is my way of remembering my roots and expressing gratitude to the place I came from and the people who shaped me into who I am. I'm rea
entry.content: I started my campaign at Kangkar, where I was born. I have ended it in Sengkang, near where I grew up. This homecoming is my way of remembering my roots and expressing gratitude to the place I came from and the people who shaped me into who I am. I'm ready to serve Singapore and Singaporeans. Please vote for me. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture üñêüèº‚ù§Ô∏è Vote for Me

entry.title: I would be humbled to be your president. Thank you for your trust in me. This is the greatest honour of my life. üñêüèæ‚ù§Ô∏è #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: My fellow Singaporeans, we are going to the polls on Friday to choose our next President. The right to vote is a fundamental part of our democracy. Please make your voice heard and make your vote count. Vote for me, because I am qualified, experienced an
entry.content: My fellow Singaporeans, we are going to the polls on Friday to choose our next President. The right to vote is a fundamental part of our democracy. Please make your voice heard and make your vote count. Vote for me, because I am qualified, experienced and trustworthy. Vote for me, because I will do you proud at home and abroad. Vote for me, because the time has come to honour the spirit of the Constitution and choose a non-partisan President. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture üñêüèº‚ù§Ô∏è
